text:
Don't worry, guys, it's only me! Have you heard 
the saying "time flies when you're having fun?"

Well, our community member Karim Ali said 
that watching a 23-minute lesson feels like

one minute because time flies 
when watching our lessons.

Because we help you to learn English in a fun 
way without getting lost, without missing the

jokes and without subtitles. So join over 
4.7 million learners from around the world

by hitting the subscribe button and bell down 
below and you won't miss a single lesson.

I hope you enjoyed learning with Squid Game 
today, if you can't get enough of our lessons

with your favorite tv series, movies and songs, 
then make sure you follow us on Instagram,

because we make new lessons there every 
single day. And if you'd like to learn

more about connected speech to understand fast 
speaking natives, check out this lesson next.
